definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
(dialect) hen/prostitute/(Tw) interfering/nosy/busybody (from Taiwanese 家婆, Tai-lo pr. [ke-pô])
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: to step down gracefully (humble expression)/to concede defeat/to play second fiddle

lit. to assess the head and discuss the feet (idiom); minute criticism of a woman's appearance/fig. to find fault in minor details/to remark upon a person's appearance/nitpicking/overcritical/judgmental
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. firing after the horse/fig. belated action/giving advice in hindsight
sugar-coated bullets, term used by Mao (originally in 1949) to refer to corrupting bourgeois influences
